The parent decided to go with the kid instead of the elderly mother because she had a history of DWI (driving while intoxicated). So by choosing the kid, the parent is taking responsibility and avoiding putting the elderly mother in a dangerous situation.

Wait, but does that mean the parent was reckless? Or was she just making an informed decision based on her previous experience with the mother?
